document.title: The Reality of Informal Employment in Turkey
document.abstract: The aim of the study is to demonstrate the reality and dimensions of the informal employment in Turkey. In the study, the author has explained the definition of informal employment and its relation with informal economy. He has also treated the characteristics, causes and the dimension of informal employment in Turkey.
